1903.TW.summary: Shihlin Paper Corporation produces and sells paper-related products. The company offers cards for use as playing and game cards; color cards for use in folders and art cards; black boards for use in speakers, frame boards, and album boards; and non-coated boards that are used in shoe boxes and environmental cartons. It also provides duplex boards with white back for use in tag cards and packaging containers; duplex boards with gray back for use in shoe and tissue paper boxes, liner boards, and packaging containers; and chip boards for gift-wrapped boxes and book binding. The company was founded in 1918 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

1904.TW.summary: Cheng Loong Corporation manufactures and sells paper products in Taiwan, Mainland China, and Southeast Asia. The company offers industrial paper products, including linerboards, coated duplex boards, corrugating medium, white top liners, and core boards, etc.; and corrugated containers, such as corrugated sheet boards, corrugated containers, display containers, waterproof containers, and paper pallets, etc., as well as pre-print services. It also provides household paper products, such as toilet papers, facial tissues, kitchen papers, and paper towels under the Andante brand name, as well as diapers and hand wash mousse; fine and specialty papers; and bond papers, receipts, computer forms, paper voucher, paper invoice, medication bags, labels/tags and flexible packaging products, etc. In addition, the company offers green paper art products for children's educational toys, pet toys, and cultural and creative products, as well as builds residential and commercial premises for rent and sale. Further, it provides electronic components, optical instruments, glass products, and precision instruments; corrugated, display, and paper boxes; foams, anti-static bubble bags, plastic buffer packaging materials, and packaging decoration printing products; and water treatment, sewage treatment, and maintenance and technical repairment services. Cheng Loong Corporation was founded in 1954 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

1906.TW.summary: Baolong International Co., Ltd. engages in the distribution of industrial paper products. It offers facial tissue and corrugated papers. The company was founded in 1965 and is based in Douliu, Taiwan.

1907.TW.summary: YFY Inc. manufactures and sells papers in Taiwan, Mainland China, and internationally. The company offers pulp, premium, Kraft, corrugated, and fine papers; cardboards, paper and pulp products, cardboard and colored cases and boxes, and food containers; napkins, tissue papers, and detergent; and styrene butadiene latex. It provides corrugated boxes and paper pallets; and commercial photography, brand packaging design, certification testing, and printing management services. The company offers color, art, and security printing services; paper, chemical, machinery, business paper, and material trading services; RFID technology solutions; production technologies for PCBS; and smart cards and application systems, information security products, and consumer service solutions. It provides banking, securities, investment trust, customer service technology, rental companies, insurance, and venture investment services. The company offers pharmaceutical and stem cell products; investment, management, and consultancy services for biotechnology companies; researches and develops pharmaceutical products and clinical applications, and internationally licenses medical devices; rare cell diagnostics technology and genetic testing; and information software services. It develops mobile applications and ePaper; operates an online store, Yuen Foong Shop, and restaurants; organic food, chemical, and electronic products; agricultural resource recycling; graphic and brand design services; wholesales agriculture products and building materials; and factoring and seedling cultivation businesses. The company offers active carbons and fertilizers; refractory materials, cement, and concrete products; environmental protection equipment; designs and prints magazines, posters, books, and advertisements; operates cogeneration facility; and constructs water processing, environmental, sewage treatment, and incinerator facilities. YFY Inc. was founded in 1924 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.
